headline: 'Let Us Finally Do Something': Biden Pleads for Gun Control Amid Mass Shooting Surge
author: Brett Wilkins
sentences: The president's remarks came amid a nationwide wave of mass shootings including the May 14 white supremacist slaughter of 10 people at a Buffalo, New York supermarket, the May 24 massacre of 19 children and two teachers at an Uvalde, Texas elementary school, and Wednesday's murder of four staff and patients at a Tulsa, Oklahoma medical center.
